message: I'm feeling generous, take it or leave it. This is my final offer.
I can do better than your 'generous' offer
Okay, let's be real. 50/50 is the fairest I can do.
Your 50/50 is not as fair as you think, considering inflation
Alright Alice, you're a tough negotiator.  This is my bottom line - take it or leave it.
Your bottom line is not low enough, considering the inflation hit you're taking
